dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SRES 88 ATS: Providing for members on the part of the Senate of the Joint Committee on Printing and the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schumer (for himself and Mr. Roberts) submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Providing for members on the part of the Senate of the Joint Committee on Printing and the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.

section.text: That the following named Members be, and they are hereby, elected members of the following joint committees of Congress:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Schumer, Mr. Udall of New Mexico, Mr. Warner, Mr. Roberts, and Mr. Chambliss.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Joint Committee of Congress on the Library:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Schumer, Mr. Durbin, Mr. Leahy, Mr. Roberts, and Mr. Blunt.
